page.title: 11YALBERTON TOR QUARRY
page.content:
When interviewed,Mr.Nicholas the manager,said that the quarry produced limestone rock.It was blasted from the face using explosives.The rock is then transported to a crusher where it is broken into 4 inch pieces.There is then a secondary crushing to 14 mm.The stone is sieved and oversized pieces receive a tertiary crushing.The stone is used locally for roads,repairs and the making of concrete.Fine dust is used in North Devon for road beds.They are taking core boaring to investigate the possibility of further development.It is estimated that the quarry has fifteen years more life.
By Christopher,David,Scott and Mark.
